testcase.name: Theme Persistence Tests › should navigate to the app successfully
Theme Persistence Tests › should not have any 403 errors in console
Theme Persistence Tests › should save theme data in localStorage
Theme Persistence Tests › should persist Ocean theme after page reload
Theme Persistence Tests › should not produce new errors after theme changes
Theme Persistence Tests › comprehensive theme persistence check
testcase.system-out: Step 1: Navigating to app... Step 2: Checking for 403 errors... Step 3: Checking localStorage... Step 4: Setting Ocean theme and reloading... Step 5: Verifying theme persistence... Step 6: Checking for new errors... Step 7: Checking visual theme application... === COMPREHENSIVE THEME PERSISTENCE TEST REPORT === { "navigation": "SUCCESS", "http403Errors": 0, "localStorageTheme": "ocean", "themePersisted": true, "newErrors": 0, "themeVisuallyApplied": true, "themeApplication": { "htmlClasses": "theme-dark", "primaryColor": "#0EA5E9", "backgroundColor": "#0C1B1F", "presetVar": "ocean", "hasThemeVariables": true, "hasFlowbiteVariables": true } }
